Repeat: k2 wrapping yarn twice for each stitch, k7
sl 2 wyif dropping extra wraps, p7
End Row: sl 2 wyif dropping extra wraps, k1

Repeat: p2, sl 3 wyif, p1, sl 3 wyif
k2 wrapping yarn twice for each stitch, sl 3 wyib, Bobble, sl 3 wyib
sl 2 wyif dropping extra wraps, p7
End Row: sl 2 wyif dropping extra wraps, k1
